about_the_game:
In "Summer Feast", players will step into the shoes of an ordinary university student, Li Lei, who struggles to balance academic pressure and financial burdens while navigating a heartfelt and humorous journey of youth.

As Li Lei, whose graduation credits are hanging by a thread, players will face challenges under the guidance of his strict yet compassionate mentor, Han Meimei. Although her high standards can seem daunting, her unique teaching methods shine through at critical moments. From lively classroom antics to enduring punishments like the infamous "window-cleaning task," players must find ways to earn her forgiveness and approval.

However, life isn’t all about Han Meimei’s critiques and strict rules. Li Lei’s good friend, Xiao Mei, plays a vital role. With her lively and warm-hearted personality, she always lends a helping hand when Li Lei feels lost. She even invites him to work at her family’s restaurant, helping him ease his financial burdens. With Xiao Mei’s support, players will experience the warmth of youthful friendship while uncovering subtle, unspoken feelings in her words.

The main storyline revolves around academics, friendship, and personal growth, requiring players to make important choices: Will you bravely tackle challenges to gain Han Meimei’s approval, or strive for balance in life with Xiao Mei’s unwavering support? Through a meticulously designed dialogue system and multiple endings, every decision players make will have profound effects on the story’s progression.

"Summer Feast" isn’t just a life simulation game filled with humor and warmth; it vividly portrays the authenticity and vibrancy of campus life through interactions between the characters. Han Meimei’s sternness, Xiao Mei’s understanding nature, and Li Lei’s journey of self-discovery amid confusion and perseverance will allow players to fully embrace the bittersweetness of youth.

Can you navigate the credit crisis unscathed? Will you win Han Meimei’s recognition or form a deeper bond with Xiao Mei? In this heartfelt and comedic campus world, the choice is yours to make.
